thread.title: ANGRY MRT COMMUTER PENALISED HALF DAY PAY, WANTS SMRT TO COMPENSATE
thread.title_full: ANGRY MRT COMMUTER PENALISED HALF DAY PAY, WANTS SMRT TO COMPENSATE

author: farhan
title: ANGRY MRT COMMUTER PENALISED HALF DAY PAY, WANTS SMRT TO COMPENSATE
text:
ANGRY MRT COMMUTER PENALISED HALF DAY PAY, WANTS SMRT TO COMPENSATE   Advertisement 
LTA must act now! Ask some other companies to bid for SMRT and takes over! 
There is a train disruption today and has caused inconvenience, confusion and delay! And worse still, because of this, i got penalized half a day pay from my boss and I am going to ask SMRT to pay for it! 
SMRT, you have to answer this, give us a month free unlimited rides to compensate us now! 
Tommy 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
